data.text: @carlquintanilla This dude is the biggest clown in WS. They all invent and guest in these research pieces. Bunch of idiotic clown making too much money trying to guess the future with outdated models 🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡

@carlquintanilla Good morning carl. Question, is it possible for you to ever quit fear mongering. How about waking up and finding  a positive story about something maybe a family did or something good a company did, your pathetic.

@carlquintanilla A big part of why investor sentiment levels are hitting the lowest readings in years.

That contrary indicator should eventually help support markets. But it can stay depressed for quite some time before the turnaround.
